name: Zonoff
tag_list: connected-home, smart-home, home-automation, software, z-wave, zigbee
overview:
Zonoff, creators of the Intuitive Home™, provides a comprehensive technology and commerce platform to service providers, integrators and OEMs who deliver Connected Home products and services to consumers. Bottom-line; we provide the “brain” of the smart home.

We Deliver…

  • Lightweight embeddable control software that resides in the home either in an OEM’s standalone device, or as a value-added feature of another CE device
  • Installation and upgrade tools for our channel partners
  • Hardware reference designs for the above software
  • “White label” UI platform that scales across HDTV, smartphone, desktop, laptop and tablet computers
  • Web services that complement our in-home software
  • A business model that creates higher ARPU (average revenue per user) and “stickier” consumers for our channel partners

We Do Not Sell Direct to Consumers; We Sell Through Channel Partners, Which Include…

  • Consumer Electronics Manufacturers
  • Service Providers (Cable, Telcos, Satellite, Security)
  • Systems Integrators
  • Energy Utilities

Why We Are Unique…

  • A startup from 2011, with a 7 year head start
  • World class RF engineers, patents pending
  • Inclusive open standards approach
  • Intuitive solution for consumer installs and upgrades
  • Team has shipped 500MM CE units over past 20 years
  • Active clients and significant revenue
  • Disruptive business model for ongoing revenue

Current Clients…

  • Somfy TaHomA (North American Integrator) - Cited as “the most comprehensive home automation solution” by industry publication, CE Pro; “Battle to become Home OS intensifies as little-known developer of Cloud-based home automation platform wins Somfy business; look out iControl, 4Home, Control4, Xanboo and others.”
  • Major Japanese Telco - Home healthcare trial
